Class FsUdpServer.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.fsgik.common.net.udp.FsUdpClient.Builder
      • xyz.fsgik.common.net.udp.FsUdpServer.Builder
  • Enclosing interface:
    FsUdpServer

    public static class FsUdpServer.Builder
extends FsUdpClient.Builder
    Builder for FsUdpServer, based on DatagramSocket.
